title: Szechuan Empire
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chinese food restaurant. Menu is predominately meat based though offers some dishes with faux meats made from soy. Has honey sesame vegetarian chicken, orange vegetarian beef, vegetarian spring rolls, asparagus (veg) chicken, vegetable egg fu young, and others. Unsure if the faux meats are purely vegan - please ask.
